element.name: Trunk - adrenal gland
element.action: releasing hormones in response to stress through the synthesis of corticosteroids such as cortisol and catecholamines such as epinephrine (adrenaline) and norepinephrine

division.name: Back
division.group: Muscles of the back; Axioappendicular muscles, Posterior axioappendicular muscles, Extrinsic shoulder muscles, Superficial Posterior Axioappendicular muscles

element.name: Erector spinae muscles
element.notes: CERVICAL NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS, THORACIC NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS, LUMBAR NERVES - ROOTS, SACRAL AND COCCYGEAL NERVES - ROOTS
element.action: extends the vertebral column; unilaterally: flex the head and neck to the same side; bilaterally: extend the vertebral column

element.name: Trunk - iliocostalis muscle
element.action: extends and lateral flexes spine

element.name: Trunk - longissimus muscle
element.action: extends spine

element.name: Trunk - spinalis muscle
element.action: lateral flexion of spine

element.name: Trunk - multifidus muscle
element.notes: CERVICAL NERVES - C5-C8, THORACIC NERVES - all, LUMBAR NERVES - all, SACRAL AND COCCYGEAL NERVES - S1-S4
element.action: stabilizes vertebrae in local movements of vertebral column

element.name: Trunk - rotatores muscles
element.action: facilitates the unilateral rotation and bilateral extension of the spine

element.name: Semispinalis capitis
element.action: extend the head

element.name: Trunk - semispinalis cervicis
element.action: extends and rotates the head to the contralateral side and also extends the ribs

element.name: Trunk - semispinalis dorsi (thoracis)
element.action: extends vertebral column

element.name: Minor deep layer of intrinsic back muscles
Trunk - levatores costarum muscles
element.action: elevate ribs, assisting respiration; assist with lateral flexion of vertebral column

element.name: Trunk - interspinales muscles
element.notes: CERVICAL NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS, 01, T1 nerve, 12, T12 nerve, LUMBAR NERVES - ROOTS
element.action: aid in extension and rotation of vertebral column

element.name: Trunk - intertransversarii muscle
element.notes: CERVICAL NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS, 01, T1 nerve, 12, T12 nerve, LUMBAR NERVES - ROOTS
element.action: aid in lateral flexion of vertebral column; acting bilaterally, stabilize vertebral column

element.name: Trunk - obliquus capitis inferior muscle
element.action: rotation of head and neck

element.name: Trunk - obliquus capitis superior muscle
element.action: extends head and flex head to the ipsilateral side

element.name: Trunk - rectus capitis posterior major muscle
element.action: ipsilateral rotation of head and extension

element.name: Trunk - rectus capitis posterior minor muscle
element.action: extends the head at the neck, but is now considered to be more of a sensory organ than a muscle

element.name: Trunk - external intercostal muscles
element.nerves: thoracic and thoracicoabdominal intercostal nerves, flexors
element.action: aid in quiet and forced inhalation

element.name: Trunk - internal intercostal muscles
element.action: aid in forced expiration

element.name: Trunk - subcostalis muscle
element.action: synergist in aiding the internal intercostal muscles with forced exhalation

element.name: Trunk - transversus thoracis muscle
element.action: depresses the ribs; aids in exertional expiration by decreasing the transverse diameter of the thoracic cage

element.name: Trunk - serratus posterior inferior muscle
element.action: depress the lower ribs, aiding in expiration

element.name: Trunk - serratus posterior superior muscle
element.nerves: thoracic and thoracicoabdominal intercostal nerves, flexors
element.action: elevate the ribs which aids in inspiration

element.name: Trunk - thoracic diaphragm
element.action: increases thoracic cavity volume; inhalation

element.name: Genitalia - testicle gland
element.action: produce androgens, primarily testosterone (growth of muscle mass and strength, regulator of cognitive and physical energy, sperm development

element.name: Genitalia - cowper gland
element.action: produces a clear, salty, viscous secretion known as pre-ejaculate, homologous to Bartholin glands in females

element.name: Genitalia - vas deferens
element.action: male - emission (prior to ejaculation), contracts, propelling sperm forward

element.name: Genitalia - cremaster muscle
element.action: raise and lower the scrotum, acts quickly, it is a reflex

element.name: Genitalia - ovary gland
element.action: secretes estrogen (maturation and maintenance of the reproductive organs), testosterone (prepares the uterus for pregnancy, and the mammary glands for lactation) and progesterone (promoting menstrual cycle changes in the endometrium)

element.name: Genitalia - bartholin gland
element.action: secretes mucus to lubricate the vagina

element.name: Genitalia - cervix
element.action: female - produces cervical mucus that changes in consistency during the menstrual cycle to prevent or promote pregnancy

element.name: Genitalia - uterus, sympathetic
element.action: female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, decreased blood flow, loss of erection

element.name: Genitalia - uterus, parasympathetic
element.action: female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, increased blood flow

element.name: Genitalia - vagina, sympathetic
element.action: female - vasoconstriction of fibromuscular tube, loss of erection

element.name: Genitalia - vagina, parasympathetic
element.action: female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, increased blood flow

element.name: Genitalia - nipple, smooth muscles
element.action: female - erection of nipples due to contraction of smooth muscle

element.name: Muscularis mucosae
element.action: keep the mucosal surface and underlying glands in a constant state of gentle agitation to expel contents of glandular crypts and enhance contact between epithelium and the contents of the lumen

element.name: Rectum - iliococcygeus muscle
element.action: supports the viscera in pelvic cavity

element.name: Rectum - pubococcygeus muscle
element.action: controls urine flow and contracts during orgasm

element.name: Rectum - puborectalis muscle
element.action: inhibit defecation

element.name: Rectum - coccygeus muscle
element.action: closing in the back part of the outlet of the pelvis

element.name: Genitalia - bulbospongiosus muscle
element.action: in males, empties the urethra; in females, clenches the vagina

element.name: Genitalia - ischiocavernosus muscle
element.action: stabilize the erect penis or (in females) tense the vagina during orgasm

element.name: Genitalia - corpus cavernosum penis
element.action: penile erection; simultaneously the ischiocavernosus and bulbospongiosus muscles compress the veins of the corpora cavernosa restricting the egress and circulation of this blood

element.name: Genitalia - corpus cavernosum clitoridis
element.action: clitoral erection; simultaneously the ischiocavernosus and bulbospongiosus muscles compress the veins of the corpora cavernosa restricting the egress and circulation of this blood

element.name: Genitalia - deep transverse perineal muscle, clitoris
element.action: fixation of central tendon of perineum, support of pelvic floor, expulsion of semen in males and last drops of urine in both sexes

element.name: Genitalia - deep transverse perineal muscle, penis
element.action: fixation of central tendon of perineum, support of pelvic floor, expulsion of semen in males and last drops of urine in both sexes

element.name: Rectum - sphincter ani externus muscle, pudental
element.action: keep the anal canal and anus closed, aids in the expulsion of the feces

element.name: Rectum - corrugator cutis ani muscle
element.action: raises the skin into ridges around the margin of the anus

element.name: Sphincter ani internus muscle, parasympathetic
element.action: keep the anal canal and anus closed, aids in the expulsion of the feces, inhibit contraction

element.name: Rectum - sphincter ani internus muscle, sympathetic
element.action: stimulate and maintain internal anal sphincter contraction

element.name: Rectum - superficial transverse perineal muscle
element.action: Fixation of central tendon of perineum, support of pelvic floor

element.name: Ureter - internal sphincter muscle of urethra, sympathetic
element.action: sympathetic contracts the muscle

element.name: Ureter - internal sphincter muscle of urethra, parasympathetic
element.nerves: splanchnic nerves, pelvic, to urinary bladder
element.action: parasympathetic relaxes the muscle

element.name: Ureter - external sphincter muscle of male urethra
element.action: control urination, constricts urethra, maintain urinary continence

element.name: Ureter - external sphincter muscle of female urethra
element.action: control urination, constricts urethra, maintain urinary continence

element.name: Ureter - detrusor urinae muscle, sympathetic
element.action: sympathetic relaxes, to store urine

element.name: Ureter - detrusor urinae muscle, parasympathetic
element.nerves: splanchnic nerves, pelvic, to urinary bladder
element.action: parasympathetic contracts, to urinate
